name: Pampas & Selene: Supporter Pack
summary:
This DLC offers extra content for Pampas & Selene that includes Skins, Pets, Special Games Modes, a Digital Game Manual, and a Special Developer OST. (Those who purchased and started the game in the first two weeks of it's release, aka Founders, already have this content as a bonus for free!)

This DLC includes:

Pets:
- Hada the Fairy
- Maggie the Cat
- Tod the Toad
- Cerdo the Pig

Skins:
- Porkchop [Pampas]
- Kleopatra [Selene]
- Cutezilla [Selene]

Game Modes:
- Explosions [Exploding Barrels!]
- Coins [No arrows or mana, only riches]
- Fast as wind [Run like the wind, unless you're hit!]
- Vampire [Drain life from kills and lose life over time]
- Hardcore Mode [You get one hit]

Special:
- A digital version of the GAME MANUAL from the MSX computer version of the game.
- A Developer OST where Fran, the developer, sings the entire soundtrack a capella.
